title: Sunderland scoops familiar face of UK political journalism (University of Sunderland)
text: ( Source : University of Sunderland ) Released : Monday 5th October 2015 at 11:01 He's used to hitting deadlines, prowling the corridors of power for a scoop and airing his political views on the news of the day. Now for his next assignment,
